forecast.day_comments: A chance of snow before 1am.  Mostly cloudy, with a low around 22. Light and variable wind becoming west around 6 mph. Winds could gust as high as 20 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 40%. Total nighttime snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible.
forecast.night_comments: A slight chance of snow showers after 4pm.  Mostly cloudy, with a high near 27. West wind 7 to 11 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.day_comments: A chance of snow showers, mainly after 3pm.  Mostly cloudy, with a high near 29. West wind 8 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 30%. Total daytime snow accumulation of 1 to 2 inches possible.
